SRP.Q: On the Time spent (minutes/day) dimension, what is the spatial relationship of Chirper relative to SnapFrame in terms of vertical (above/below) direction?

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Time spent (minutes/day)} axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart.
